content: Bought for bf, great deep clean however does make his skin fairly dry after using, but for him is a good thing because he has really oily acne prone skin
Bought this for my husband and he really likes it! His skin has cleared up and looks healthier. He's already asked me to get another for him as a backup.
My boyfriend loves this stuff - he's used two bottles so far and squeezes every drop out. This is a guy who won't use "any products" - so that's about ten stars.

I got this for my husband since he didn't have a face wash, he liked it (even though he won't admit it) so much so he asked me to get him more. He's on his second container which is rare for my guy, he's even started using the lotion I got him.. now to get him to use the eye cream.. one product at a time ;)
title: Works great!
First product my BF uses
Hubby loves it.
Lab Series
